Free_Value_Prop: Free AI Act calculator, compliance checklists
Why_This_Score: Regulatory tsunami incoming. High-ticket B2B, sticky once embedded (switching = re-audit). Main risk: Big 4 consultancies wake up.
Strong unit economics at $20k+ deals. But saturated market, constant Bubble/Retool competition, 6-month sales cycles typical.
Proven model (Tiny/FE International), but requires $500k+ capital, deep technical expertise. Not really "99% free" model.
Good margins but brutal competition (Apollo, ZoomInfo, Clay). Need $2M+ to build competitive dataset.
Solves real pain, but hard to scale quality. Marketplace dynamics = race to bottom on price.
Duolingo has $1-2 CAC, 33x LTV. You have $50+ CAC, maybe 3x LTV. They have $300M AI budget. You don't.
Slightly better unit economics via bundling, but still competing with free Duolingo. EdTech retention = 2-30%. Nightmare.
TPT has 5M teachers, you're starting at zero. Teachers share everything in Facebook groups. Copyright nightmare.
Thingiverse = infinite free files. Creators earn 15-30% on paid platforms. Race to bottom, impossible differentiation.
High margins theoretically, but platforms will ban AI content instantly once detected. Legal/ethical minefield.
2% day-30 retention in EdTech. Parents buy, kids don't use. Massive creative production costs for quality games.
Publishers own all valuable IP. Copyright hell. Parents use library or pirate. $10B market but Big 5 own 80%.
Khan Academy is free and better. IXL/Prodigy have school contracts locked. Individual parent CAC = $150+.
Zero moat. ChatGPT generates infinite stories free. No network effects, pure commodity.
Spotify devalued ambient to 1/5th royalties. YouTube has infinite free options. Maybe 10k commercial buyers globally.
Redbubble takes 20%, Printful has no fees, Canva is free. POD margins already razor-thin. This adds zero value.
273,000 medical practices in US. Clear ROI (saves $50k+/year in coding errors). Human verification creates regulatory moat. CAC ~$3k sustainable with $60k LTV.
Workflow automation market $24B growing 10-23% CAGR. B2B model with proven $10k+ ACVs. Challenge: competing with Zapier/Make but service layer defensible.
500 per contract review
LLM_Source: 30M+ SMBs need this. Higher margins than pure legal services. Human lawyer layer prevents liability issues. Recurring revenue from retainers possible.

Why_This_Score: 300k+ patent applications yearly. Current searches cost $10-50k. AI cuts cost 90% while human verification maintains quality. Niche but profitable.
32M SMBs need SEO help. Proven demand but crowded market. AI reduces content cost 80%, human editing maintains quality. CAC ~$500 reasonable.
POD market $13B growing 25% but 228,000+ stores competing. Average seller takes 165 days to first $1k. Success requires 10+ new designs weekly. Margins 20-40% realistic.
3D printing $20B+ market but Thingiverse dominates free. Cults3D takes 20% commission model working. Teacher niche smart but TAM limited (~200k potential subs max).
Trying to compete with Duolingo (500M+ users) and Khan Academy (free). CAC would exceed $100 for $216 annual revenue. Retention under 6 months typical.
Indeed/LinkedIn dominate. CAC ~$50 for $39/mo product problematic. 3-month average retention means $117 LTV vs $50 CAC = barely profitable.
Spotify pays $0.003/stream. Commercial licensing dominated by Epidemic Sound. Creating 500 quality tracks costs $50k+. Maybe 1% conversion to paid realistic.
Duolingo has $300M AI budget, you have zero. Market worth $7B but top 5 apps have 80%+ share. CAC exceeds $200 in this space. Death by competition.
Children's book market growing only 3% CAGR. Parents want known brands (Disney, etc.). Copyright nightmare for translations. Epic! offers 40,000 books for $10/mo.
Game-based learning competitive ($14B market). But Minecraft Education and Roblox dominate. Building 20 quality games costs $200k+. School sales cycle 18+ months.
Khan Academy is free and better. Prodigy has 150M users. Creating 30 engaging math games requires $300k+ investment. Parents won't pay when free alternatives exist.
Teachers Pay Teachers has this locked with 7M+ resources. Creating 50k quality pages impossible without plagiarism. Pinterest has infinite free printables. DOA.
Jack of all trades, master of none. No clear audience. Competing against every educational app simultaneously. CAC would exceed $300 for $132 annual revenue. Guaranteed money pit.
